thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 08 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Brazil's Lojas Renner misses profit estimates as costs jump

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Brazil's Lojas Renner misses profit estimates as costs jump
text:
BRASILIA, Feb 8 (Reuters) - Lojas Renner SA, Brazilâ€™s biggest apparel retailer, missed fourth-quarter profit estimates on Thursday, as a sharp increase in costs outpaced growing revenue amid an aggressive expansion drive.
In a statement, Renner said net income totaled 332 million reais ($101 million), up 10.7 percent from the same period a year earlier. Analysts projected profit of 377 million reais in the period, according to consensus estimates compiled by Reuters. (Reporting by Anthony Boadle; Editing by Chris Reese)
